column2: Hardy Poppies should be sown even earlier; August is the best time.
column3: Hardy Poppies should be sown even earlier; August is the best time.

column2: Dahlias are now at their full growth.
column3: Dahlias are now at their full growth.

column2: It is a native plant, but not found in this neighbourhood; I brought it from Cornwall, where it is so plentiful in the chinks of the granite stone-fences.
column3: It is a native plant, but not found in this neighbourhood; I brought it from Cornwall, where it is so plentiful in the chinks of the granite stone fences.
